Package rekit.util

Class LambdaUtil

java.lang.Object
rekit.util.LambdaUtil
public final class LambdaUtil
extends Object
This class contains several methods to work with Lambdas.
Author:
Dominik Fuchss

    • invoke

      public static <I,​ O> O invoke​(org.fuchss.tools.lambda.FunctionWithException<I,​O> in, I i)
      Invoke a FunctionWithException.
      Type Parameters:
      I - the in type
      O - the out type
      Parameters:
      in - the function
      i - the input
      Returns:
      the output or null (in error case)

      Invoke a ConsumerWithException.
      Type Parameters:
      I - the in type
      Parameters:

      i - the input

    • invoke

      public static <O> O invoke​(org.fuchss.tools.lambda.SupplierWithException<O> in)
      Invoke a SupplierWithException.
      Type Parameters:
      O - the out type
      Parameters:
      in - the function
      Returns:
      the return value of the Supplier or null on failure
